title: Looking for a friend Best / Highest Eye Appeal HoF (or 2) for $5000
author: Sean1125

posts.post_title: Looking for a friend Best / Highest Eye Appeal HoF (or 2) for $5000
posts.post_content: Trying to help a friend who wants to get into collecting. I am open to between 1 and 3 cards adding up to no more than $5000. I am not opposed to one $3k-$4k card either. Not trying to make anything and willing to pay a fair market price via paypal. Please LMK what you have!

I’ve got a very nice Cy Young Piedmont 150 portrait, I’m putting up for sale next week.   It’s probably a 2 and I have a graded 1 I can compare it to.  Asking 2400 for it.   Feel free to email me [url]jamesmckee2018@gmail.com[/url]
